detectors.description:
balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ReliveCoin.sol#40)
	- StandardToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ReliveCoin.sol#76-78)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ReliveCoin.sol#60-69)
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ReliveCoin.sol#41)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ReliveCoin.sol#42)
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ReliveCoin.sol#122-124)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ReliveCoin.sol#109-114)
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ReliveCoin.sol#44)
